import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BooksService } from '../../services/books.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-listofbooks', templateUrl: './listofbooks.component.html', styleUrls: ['./listofbooks.component.css'] }) export class ListofbooksComponent { books:any[] = [] constructor(private service:BooksService){ } ngOnInit(){ this.getlist() } getlist(){ this.service.getAllBooks().subscribe((data:any)=>{ this.books=data }) } }
